title: nil is not nil
body:
by **matthias.benkmann**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. http://play.golang.org/p/E6ZnS74Hnp
2. Run

What is the expected output?

Either something other than "<nil>" in the first line or
"true" in the second line. I would prefer to see "true" in the
second line.


What do you see instead?

y: <nil>
y==nil: false
